dashboards.description: E-Business Suite Monitoring: Infrastructure, Technology Stack, Application, and Functional Components

savedSearches.description: Problem labels identified in Concurrent Request Logs, Transaction Logs, Processing Logs

uiConfig.queryString: 'Problem Priority' != null and 'Log Source' in ('EBS Concurrent Request Logs', 'EBS Concurrent Manager Logs', 'EBS Internal Concurrent Manager Logs', 'EBS Transaction Manager Logs') | eval pos = indexOf(Entity, '/') | eval entity = if(pos != -1, substr(Entity, 0, pos), Entity) | stats count by Label, entity
'Entity Type' in ('Oracle Database Instance', 'Oracle Database Listener') and 'Error ID' != null | stats count as Errors by 'Error ID'
'Log Source' like in ('OCI VCN Flow Unified Schema Logs', '%access%') and 'Client Coordinates' != null or Entity = 'ebs-demo-1211' | geostats count as logrecords by 'Log Source' | sort -logrecords

savedSearches.description: Monitored EBS Infrastructure, Application, and Database Components in this time range.

uiConfig.queryString: * | stats distinctcount(Entity), trend(distinctcount(Entity))

savedSearches.description: Overall Trend of Logs for Monitored EBS Infrastructure, Application, and Database Components in this time range.

uiConfig.queryString: * | timestats count by Entity

savedSearches.description: New issues, outlier, and trends in last 8 hours compared to prior 8 hours
savedSearches.displayName: New Issues and Outliers - last 8 hours

uiConfig.queryString: Time > dateRelative(8hour) and 'Problem Priority' != null | clustercompare [ Time between dateRelative(16hour) and dateRelative(8hour) ]
'Log Source' = 'Oracle EBS Transaction Logs' | eval x = concat('', Module) | stats count by x

'Log Source' like 'EBS Sensor*' | lookup table = 'EBS Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area', 'Issue Severity' using sensor = 'Metric Name' | eval x = ltrim('Prod Area', 'ebs -') | stats count as 'Total Issues' by x

tableColumns: Product to raise SR if help needed

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' not like in ('%EBS Sensor%') | stats distinctcount('Log Source') as 'Monitored Logs', trend by 'Entity Type', Entity

'Log Source' like 'EBS Sensor*' | lookup table = 'EBS Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area' as Product, 'Issue Severity' as Severity using sensor = 'Metric Name' | eval sev = concat('Severity: ', Severity) | stats distinctcount(sensor) as 'Total Issues' by sev
* | stats count by Entity

'Entity Type' in ('WebLogic Server', 'Oracle Internet Directory', 'Oracle HTTP Server', 'Oracle Access Management Server', 'WebLogic Domain', OC4J) and 'Error ID' != 'bea-000000' and 'Error ID' != null | stats count as errors, trend by 'Error ID' | top limit = 10 errors

tiles.displayName: New Issues and Outliers - last 8 hours

dashboards.description: Concurrent Processing Requests, Workflow Notification Mailer Health Monitoring

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = 'EBS Workflow Notification Mailer Logs' | timestats count as logrecords by Component
Entity like 'EBS_PROD_01%' | stats count by 'Entity Type'

savedSearches.description: Access Log Errors by HTTP Status
savedSearches.displayName: Access Log Errors by HTTP Status

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' = 'EBS Concurrent Request Logs' and Program != null | eval pos = indexOf(Entity, '/') | eval entity = if(pos != -1, substr(Entity, 0, pos), Entity) | stats count('Request ID') as Count, trend by Program | sort -Count
'Log Source' = 'EBS Concurrent Request Logs' and Label != null | stats count by Label
'Log Source' = 'EBS Concurrent Request Logs' and 'Program Details' != null | stats count as reqs by 'Program Details' | sort -reqs
'Log Source' = 'FMW WLS Server Access Logs' | timestats count as logrecords by Entity

'Entity Type' in ('WebLogic Server', 'Oracle Internet Directory', 'Oracle HTTP Server', 'Oracle Access Management Server', 'WebLogic Domain') and 'Error ID' not in ('bea-000000', null) | stats count as ct by 'Error ID' | top limit = 10 ct

'Log Source' = 'EBS Concurrent Request Logs' | link 'Request ID' | stats unique(Application) as Application, unique(Program) as Program, unique('Program Details') as Job, earliest('Event Start Time') as 'Request Start Time', latest('Event End Time') as 'Request End Time' | eval 'Time Taken' = 'Request End Time' - 'Request Start Time' | classify correlate = -*, Program 'Request Start Time', Application, 'Time Taken', Job as 'Concurrent Requests Analysis' | eventstats count('Request ID') as Requests, distinctcount(Application) as Applications, distinctcount(Program) as Programs, distinctcount(Job) as Jobs | fields -'Start Time', -'End Time'
'Log Source' = 'EBS Concurrent Request Logs' and Program != null | stats count('Request ID') as req by Program | sort -req
'Log Source' like '%notification mailer%' and 'Problem Priority' != null | cluster

tiles.displayName: Access Log Errors by HTTP Status

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' like '%VCN%' | geostats count as logrecords | sort -logrecords

'Entity Type' = 'OCI VCN Virtual Network Interface Card' and 'Log Source' = 'OCI VCN Flow Unified Schema Logs' and Action = reject | stats count as 'Rejected Requests', latest('Client Host Country') as Location, trend by 'Source IP' | sort -'Rejected Requests' | top limit = 10 'Rejected Requests'
'Entity Type' = 'Host (Linux)' and Label != null | stats count as logrecords by Label, 'Problem Priority'

'Entity Type' = 'Host (Linux)' and 'Log Source' = 'Linux Audit Logs' and 'Security Result' in (denied, failure) and 'Security Actor IP Address' != null | stats count as logrecords by 'Security Actor IP Address' | top limit = 10 logrecords
'Entity Type' = 'Host (Linux)' and 'Log Source' = 'Linux Audit Logs' and 'Security Category' != null | stats count as logrecords by 'Security Category' | sort -logrecords
'Entity Type' = 'Host (Linux)' and 'Log Source' = 'Linux Audit Logs' | stats count as logrecords by Type | sort -logrecords
'Entity Type' = 'Host (Linux)' | cluster

savedSearches.description: Count of VCN Virtual Network Interface Cards

uiConfig.queryString: 'Entity Type' = 'OCI VCN Virtual Network Interface Card' and 'Log Source' = 'OCI VCN Flow Unified Schema Logs' | stats distinctcount(Entity) as VNICs
'Entity Type' = 'Host (Linux)' | stats count as logrecords by Entity

dashboards.description: Business Issues monitoring identified by SQL based checks called sensors. These checks run at a user defined frequency.

savedSearches.description: Problem labels identified in Concurrent Request Logs, Transaction Logs, Processing Logs

uiConfig.queryString: 'Problem Priority' != null and 'Log Source' in ('EBS Concurrent Request Logs', 'EBS Concurrent Manager Logs', 'EBS Internal Concurrent Manager Logs', 'EBS Transaction Manager Logs') | eval pos = indexOf(Entity, '/') | eval entity = if(pos != -1, substr(Entity, 0, pos), Entity) | stats count by Label, entity
'Log Source' like 'EBS Sensor:%' | stats distinctcount('Log Source'), trend(count('Log Source'))

'Log Source' like 'EBS Sensor*' | lookup table = 'EBS Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area', 'Issue Severity' using sensor = 'Metric Name' | eval x = ltrim('Prod Area', 'ebs -') | stats count as 'Total Issues' by x

tableColumns: Product to raise SR if help needed

savedSearches.description: Ebusiness Suite Functional Issues across areas

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' like 'EBS Sensor*' | lookup table = 'EBS Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area', 'Issue Severity' using sensor = 'Metric Name' | stats count as 'Total Issues' by Description, 'Prod Area'

tableColumns: Product to raise SR if help needed

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' like 'EBS Sensor*' | lookup table = 'EBS Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area', 'Issue Severity' using sensor = 'Metric Name' | eval x = ltrim('Prod Area', 'ebs -') | stats count as 'Total Issues' by x | sort -'Total Issues'

tableColumns: Product to raise SR if help needed

uiConfig.queryString: * | eval n = 335 | stats max(n), trend(max(n)) as Sensors

tableColumns: Product to raise SR if help needed

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' like 'EBS Sensor*' | lookup table = 'EBS Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area' as Product, 'Issue Severity' as Severity using sensor = 'Metric Name' | eval sev = concat('Severity: ', Severity) | stats distinctcount(sensor) as 'Total Issues' by sev

Time > dateRelative(24hour) and 'Log Source' like 'EBS Sensor*' | lookup table = 'EBS Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area', 'Issue Severity' using sensor = 'Metric Name' | eval x = ltrim('Prod Area', 'ebs -') | timestats count as 'Total Issues' by x

tableColumns: Product to raise SR if help needed

uiConfig.queryString: 'Log Source' like 'EBS Sensor*' | lookup table = 'EBS Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area' as Product, 'Issue Severity' as Severity, Scheduling as 'Check Schedule' using sensor = 'Metric Name' | where 'Check Schedule' != null | stats distinctcount(sensor) as 'Total Issues' by 'Check Schedule', Severity, Product

'Log Source' like 'EBS Sensor*' | link 'Log Source' | rename Count as 'Number of triggers' | stats latest(sensor) as Sensor | lookup table = 'EBS Functional Sensors' select 'Issue Summary', 'Issue Description' as Description, 'Solution KM Note' as N1, 'Business Flow', 'Business Impact', 'Product to raise SR if help needed', 'Prod Area', 'Issue Severity' using Sensor = 'Metric Name' | eval 'Issue Support Link' = url('https://support.oracle.com/knowledge/Oracle%20E-Business%20Suite/' || replace(N1, '.', _) || '.html', 'Issue Summary') | eval 'File SR' = url('https://support.oracle.com/epmos/faces/SrCreate', SR) | highlightgroups color = #FF5733 [ * | where 'Issue Severity' = '4' ] as 'High Priority' | eventstats sum('Number of triggers') as 'Total Sensor Triggers', distinctcount('Prod Area') as 'Affected Product Areas', distinctcount('Business Flow') as 'Affected Business Flows', distinctcount('Log Source') as 'Unique Sensors Triggered' | fields -N1, -'Issue Severity', -Sensor, -'Issue Summary', 'Log Source' as Sensor

LINK_SEARCH_SETTINGS.linkSummaryInput:
card=<field:Affected Product Areas>
card=<field:Affected Business Flows>
card=<field:Unique Sensors Triggered>
card=<field:Total Sensor Triggers>
tableColumns: Product to raise SR if help needed
